title: Augmented Reality Game-based Science English Communication Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic scientific terminology and job-related English expressions
context.additional_context: Targeting in-service professionals needing to improve scientific English report writing and international conference presentation skills, with personalized learning progress tracking and feedback systems.

learning_goals: Learners can acquire over 200 specialized vocabulary terms related to science experiments through AR games with 80% accuracy.
Learners can achieve a fluency score of B1 or higher (based on CEFR) when presenting science topics in an AR simulation environment.
Learners can maintain weekly learning engagement at 90% or higher using gamified elements (quests, reward systems).

resources: Customized AR Content for Science Subjects

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
